revised_title: On the Composition and Properties of Urinary Extractive Matters
tldr: The author investigates the composition and properties of extractive matters in urine, focusing on their role in forming color and their potential connection to hippuric acid. They describe various methods for extracting and analyzing these substances, and discuss the limitations of previous research in the field. The author's findings challenge some existing theories and contribute to a better understanding of the chemistry of urine.
